result.title: betaround4 division2 triangle
result.content: Hello everyone can anyone please help me through my doubt in this problem as long as i know a non-degenerate triangle having sides a,b,c condition is sum of two sides is greater than third side and if any sum of two sides is equal to third side then it is degenerate and if both of the above conditions fail then we cannot form a triangle but considering the test cases which they had given 4 2 1 3 is triangle(non degenerate) 7 2 2 4 is segment (degenerate) 3 5 9 1 impossible and finally if in any triangle if we have one side as length 1 then we cannot form a triangle considering this first case also cannot form a triangle so guys can anyone please help me i am not asking for answer neither am asking for logic please just tell me whether those test cases are correct or not based on your logic and just telling me whether i am on right track or not will be sufficient and i am new to codeforces but i love programming and i struck up here though i didn't solved much of any problems sorry for my lengthy message please help me thanq if my question has no clarity then please refer to the betaround4 contest which is on last page in contests and first problem in it.
